item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/01/05/fitbit-charge-hr/#comment-4427">Chris Finke</a>.
More often than not I'm at my desk when it runs out, so I just plug it in. It seems to charge pretty quick, though I haven't timed it.
I was considering the Surge, but wasn't sure if the larger size would feel too strange.

item.title: By: Chris Finke
item.dc:creator: Chris Finke
item.content:encoded:
I really like mine too, especially the heartrate and activity charts in the online dashboard.

Instead what I’ve started doing is to wear the HR until it runs out of juice completely, then plug in.

I got the Surge, and I’ve found that charging it while I shower and get dressed gives it enough juice to last about four days.
